ingredients: spinach 200g, paneer 100g, onion 1, tomato 1, garlic 2 cloves, ginger 1 tsp, cumin 1 tsp, turmeric 0.5 tsp, garam masala 0.5 tsp, oil 1 tbsp, salt 1 tsp
directions: 1. Sauté onions, garlic, ginger. 2. Add tomato & spices. 3. Add spinach & cook. 4. Add paneer & simmer 5 min.

ingredients: chickpeas 200g, onion 1, tomato 2, garlic 2 cloves, ginger 1 tsp, cumin 1 tsp, coriander 1 tsp, turmeric 0.5 tsp, chili 1, oil 1 tbsp, salt 1 tsp
directions: 1. Soak chickpeas overnight. 2. Sauté onion, garlic, ginger. 3. Add tomato & spices. 4. Add chickpeas & simmer 20 min.

ingredients: rice 100g, urad dal 50g, potato 2, onion 1, mustard seeds 0.5 tsp, turmeric 0.5 tsp, curry leaves 5, oil 1 tbsp, salt 1 tsp
directions: 1. Soak rice & dal overnight, grind to batter. 2. Cook dosa on pan. 3. Prepare potato filling with spices. 4. Fill dosa with potato mixture.

ingredients: potato 200g, cauliflower 200g, onion 1, tomato 1, garlic 2 cloves, ginger 1 tsp, cumin 1 tsp, turmeric 0.5 tsp, chili 1, oil 1 tbsp, salt 1 tsp
directions: 1. Sauté onions, garlic, ginger. 2. Add tomato & spices. 3. Add potato & cauliflower, cook 20 min.

ingredients: tamarind 50g, tomato 2, garlic 3 cloves, cumin 1 tsp, black pepper 0.5 tsp, curry leaves 5, coriander 1 tsp, salt 1 tsp, water 500ml
directions: 1. Soak tamarind in water. 2. Boil tomato, tamarind water, garlic, spices. 3. Simmer 10 min. 4. Garnish with coriander.

ingredients: chicken 250g, butter 20g, cream 50ml, tomato puree 100ml, onion 1, garlic 2 cloves, ginger 1 tsp, garam masala 1 tsp, chili 1, salt 1 tsp
directions: 1. Sauté onion, garlic, ginger. 2. Add tomato puree & spices. 3. Add chicken, cook 20 min. 4. Stir in butter & cream.

ingredients: rice 100g, urad dal 50g, salt 0.5 tsp, water 100ml
directions: 1. Soak rice & dal overnight, grind to batter. 2. Ferment 8h. 3. Steam batter in idli molds 10 min.

ingredients: potato 150g, cauliflower 50g, carrot 50g, peas 50g, onion 1, tomato 2, butter 10g, oil 1 tbsp, chili 1, salt 1 tsp, pav bread 4
directions: 1. Boil vegetables. 2. Sauté onion, tomato & spices. 3. Mash vegetables into bhaji. 4. Serve with toasted buttered pav.

ingredients: milk powder 100g, flour 20g, ghee 20g, sugar 100g, water 50ml, cardamom 0.5 tsp, rose water 1 tsp
directions: 1. Make dough with milk powder, flour & ghee. 2. Shape into balls & fry. 3. Boil sugar syrup with cardamom & rose water. 4. Soak fried balls in syrup.
substitutions: {"milk powder": ["soy milk powder", "almond milk powder"], "ghee": ["coconut oil", "vegan butter"]}

ingredients: gram flour 100g, yogurt 50g, water 50ml, turmeric 0.5 tsp, baking soda 0.25 tsp, salt 0.5 tsp, oil 1 tbsp
directions: 1. Mix gram flour, yogurt, water & spices. 2. Steam batter 15 min. 3. Temper with oil & mustard seeds.

ingredients: eggplant 300g, onion 1, tomato 2, garlic 2 cloves, ginger 1 tsp, green chili 1, cumin 1 tsp, oil 1 tbsp, salt 1 tsp
directions: 1. Roast eggplant until soft. 2. Sauté onion, garlic, ginger, chili. 3. Add tomato & spices. 4. Mash eggplant & cook 5 min.

ingredients: whole wheat flour 100g, fresh fenugreek leaves 50g, yogurt 20ml, turmeric 0.25 tsp, chili 0.5 tsp, salt 0.5 tsp, oil 1 tsp
directions: 1. Mix flour, fenugreek, yogurt & spices into dough. 2. Roll thin & cook on tawa with oil.
substitutions: {"yogurt": ["soy yogurt", "coconut yogurt"], "whole wheat flour": ["millet flour", "rice flour"]}

ingredients: green moong dal 100g, ginger 1 tsp, green chili 1, salt 0.5 tsp, oil 1 tsp
directions: 1. Soak moong dal overnight, grind with ginger & chili. 2. Cook thin pancakes on tawa.

ingredients: paneer 150g, bell pepper 1, onion 1, tomato 2, garlic 2 cloves, ginger 1 tsp, cumin 1 tsp, coriander powder 1 tsp, chili 1, oil 1 tbsp, salt 1 tsp
directions: 1. Sauté onion, garlic, ginger. 2. Add tomato & spices. 3. Add bell pepper & paneer, cook 10 min.

ingredients: chicken 250g, yogurt 50g, ginger-garlic paste 1 tsp, chili powder 1 tsp, turmeric 0.5 tsp, salt 1 tsp, oil 1 tbsp
directions: 1. Marinate chicken in yogurt & spices 1h. 2. Grill or bake 20 min.

ingredients: whole wheat flour 100g, potato 150g, green chili 1, coriander 1 tsp, salt 0.5 tsp, oil 1 tsp, butter 1 tsp
directions: 1. Boil & mash potatoes. 2. Mix with spices & stuff into rolled dough. 3. Cook on tawa with oil/butter.

ingredients: semolina 50g, whole wheat flour 50g, chickpeas 50g, potato 50g, tamarind 20g, mint 10g, coriander 5g, chili 1, salt 0.5 tsp
directions: 1. Make small puris & fry. 2. Boil chickpeas & potatoes. 3. Prepare tamarind-mint water. 4. Serve with filling & water.

ingredients: mutton 250g, onion 1, garlic 2 cloves, ginger 1 tsp, tomato 1, yogurt 50ml, chili 1, garam masala 1 tsp, oil 1 tbsp, salt 1 tsp
directions: 1. Sauté onion, garlic, ginger. 2. Add tomato & spices. 3. Add mutton & cook 40 min. 4. Stir in yogurt & simmer 5 min.

ingredients: basmati rice 200g, mixed vegetables 200g, onion 1, garlic 2 cloves, ginger 1 tsp, cumin 1 tsp, garam masala 1 tsp, yogurt 50g, oil 1 tbsp, salt 1 tsp
directions: 1. Sauté onion, garlic, ginger. 2. Add vegetables & spices. 3. Add rice & water, cook 20 min. 4. Stir in yogurt.

ingredients: semolina 100g, onion 1, carrot 50g, peas 50g, green chili 1, ginger 1 tsp, water 200ml, oil 1 tbsp, salt 0.5 tsp
directions: 1. Roast semolina. 2. Sauté vegetables & spices. 3. Add water, cook semolina 5 min.

ingredients: semolina 100g, water 50ml, chickpeas 50g, potato 50g, tamarind chutney 30ml, mint-coriander chutney 30ml, salt 0.5 tsp
directions: 1. Make hollow puris & fry 5 min. 2. Boil potatoes & chickpeas. 3. Serve puris with filling & flavored water.

ingredients: grated coconut 50g, roasted chana dal 10g, green chili 1, ginger 1 tsp, yogurt 50ml, salt 0.5 tsp
directions: 1. Blend all ingredients into smooth chutney.

ingredients: moong dal 100g, ginger 1 tsp, green chili 1, salt 0.5 tsp, oil 1 tsp
directions: 1. Soak dal 4h & grind. 2. Cook thin pancakes on tawa.

ingredients: paneer 100g, potato 100g, cashew 20g, cream 50ml, onion 1, tomato 1, ginger 1 tsp, garlic 1 clove, chili 1, garam masala 1 tsp, oil 1 tbsp, salt 1 tsp
directions: 1. Mash paneer & potato, mix with cashews, shape koftas & fry 5 min. 2. Sauté onion, garlic, ginger, tomato & spices. 3. Add cream & simmer koftas 5 min.

ingredients: all-purpose flour 150g, yogurt 50ml, yeast 1 tsp, sugar 1 tsp, salt 0.5 tsp, oil 1 tbsp
directions: 1. Mix ingredients & knead dough 10 min. 2. Rest 1h. 3. Roll & cook on tawa 5 min each side.

ingredients: chicken 250g, yogurt 50ml, garlic 1 clove, ginger 1 tsp, chili 1 tsp, turmeric 0.5 tsp, garam masala 1 tsp, lemon juice 1 tbsp, salt 1 tsp
directions: 1. Marinate chicken with yogurt & spices 1h. 2. Bake/grill at 200°C 20 min. 3. Serve hot.

ingredients: whole wheat flour 100g, water 50ml, salt 0.25 tsp
directions: 1. Knead flour, water & salt into dough 5 min. 2. Roll & cook on tawa 2–3 min each side.

ingredients: paneer 150g, peas 100g, onion 1, tomato 1, garlic 1 clove, ginger 1 tsp, chili 1, garam masala 1 tsp, oil 1 tbsp, salt 1 tsp
directions: 1. Sauté onion, garlic, ginger, tomato & spices. 2. Add peas & cook 5 min. 3. Add paneer, simmer 5 min.

ingredients: okra 200g, onion 1, tomato 1, garlic 1 clove, ginger 1 tsp, chili 1, turmeric 0.5 tsp, oil 1 tbsp, salt 1 tsp
directions: 1. Sauté onion, garlic, ginger & spices. 2. Add okra & tomato, cook 15 min.

ingredients: yogurt 200ml, sugar 2 tsp, cardamom 0.25 tsp, ice cubes 4
directions: 1. Blend all ingredients until frothy. 2. Serve chilled.

ingredients: khoya 100g, flour 10g, sugar 100g, water 100ml, cardamom 0.25 tsp, oil 1 cup
directions: 1. Mix khoya & flour, shape balls. 2. Fry 5 min until golden. 3. Boil sugar & water with cardamom, soak fried balls 10 min.

ingredients: all-purpose flour 100g, yogurt 50ml, sugar 100g, water 50ml, saffron 0.1g, oil 1 cup
directions: 1. Make batter with flour & yogurt, ferment 4h. 2. Fry batter in spiral shapes 2–3 min. 3. Soak in sugar syrup 5 min.

ingredients: rice 100g, moong dal 50g, onion 1, garlic 1 clove, ginger 1 tsp, turmeric 0.5 tsp, ghee 1 tbsp, salt 1 tsp
directions: 1. Wash rice & dal. 2. Sauté onion, garlic, ginger in ghee. 3. Add rice, dal, turmeric, salt & water 2 cups. 4. Cook 20 min.

ingredients: potato 200g, poppy seeds 20g, green chili 1, mustard oil 1 tbsp, turmeric 0.5 tsp, salt 1 tsp
directions: 1. Grind poppy seeds with chili. 2. Fry in mustard oil, add potato & turmeric. 3. Cook 15 min until tender.

ingredients: all-purpose flour 150g, water 70ml, cabbage 50g, carrot 50g, onion 1, soy sauce 1 tsp, salt 1 tsp, oil 1 tbsp
directions: 1. Knead dough, rest 30 min. 2. Chop vegetables & mix with salt & soy sauce. 3. Fill dough & steam 15 min.

ingredients: potato 150g, peas 50g, all-purpose flour 100g, oil 1 cup, cumin 0.5 tsp, chili 0.5 tsp, salt 1 tsp
directions: 1. Make dough with flour & water. 2. Boil potato & peas, sauté with spices. 3. Fill dough, shape triangles, fry 5–7 min.

ingredients: all-purpose flour 100g, urad dal 50g, cumin 0.5 tsp, chili 0.5 tsp, oil 1 tbsp, salt 0.5 tsp
directions: 1. Prepare dough with flour & water. 2. Grind dal with spices. 3. Fill dough, shape discs, fry 5–7 min.

ingredients: gram flour 100g, potato 100g, onion 1, chili 1, cumin 0.5 tsp, salt 1 tsp, water 50ml, oil 1 cup
directions: 1. Slice potato & onion. 2. Mix gram flour, spices & water into batter. 3. Coat vegetables & fry 5 min.

ingredients: potato 200g, green peas 50g, chili 1, coriander 1 tsp, salt 1 tsp, oil 1 tbsp
directions: 1. Boil potato, mash & mix with peas & spices. 2. Shape patties & shallow fry 5 min.

ingredients: semolina 100g, water 50ml, potato 100g, chickpeas 50g, tamarind 2 tbsp, mint 10g, chili 0.5 tsp, salt 0.5 tsp
directions: 1. Prepare puris by frying semolina dough 2–3 min. 2. Boil potato & chickpeas. 3. Mix tamarind, mint & chili for water. 4. Serve puris filled with potato, chickpeas & water.

ingredients: puffed rice 100g, sev 20g, onion 1, tomato 1, coriander 1 tsp, tamarind chutney 2 tbsp, chili 0.25 tsp, salt 0.5 tsp
directions: 1. Mix puffed rice, chopped vegetables & chutney. 2. Top with sev & coriander. Serve immediately.

ingredients: puri 10 pcs, boiled potato 100g, onion 1, tomato 1, coriander 1 tsp, tamarind chutney 2 tbsp, chili 0.25 tsp
directions: 1. Place potato & vegetables on puris. 2. Top with chutney & sev. Serve immediately.

ingredients: puri 10 pcs, yogurt 100ml, boiled potato 50g, onion 1, tamarind chutney 2 tbsp, chili 0.25 tsp
directions: 1. Fill puris with potato & onion. 2. Pour yogurt & chutney on top. 3. Serve immediately.

ingredients: potato 150g, white peas 100g, onion 1, tomato 1, chili 0.5 tsp, turmeric 0.25 tsp, oil 1 tbsp, salt 1 tsp
directions: 1. Boil & mash potatoes, shape patties, shallow fry 5 min. 2. Cook peas with spices to make ragda. 3. Serve patties with ragda.

ingredients: large green chili 6, gram flour 100g, salt 0.5 tsp, water 50ml, oil 1 cup
directions: 1. Slice chilies & remove seeds. 2. Coat with gram flour batter. 3. Fry 5 min until golden.

ingredients: boiled corn 100g, onion 1, tomato 1, chili 0.25 tsp, lemon juice 1 tsp, coriander 1 tsp, chaat masala 0.5 tsp
directions: 1. Mix all ingredients & serve chilled.

ingredients: puffed rice 100g, mustard oil 1 tsp, chili 0.25 tsp, coriander 1 tsp, onion 1, peanuts 20g, salt 0.5 tsp
directions: 1. Mix all ingredients & serve immediately.

ingredients: whole wheat flour 100g, oil 1 tsp, salt 0.5 tsp, water 50ml
directions: 1. Knead dough, roll thin, roast on tawa 3–4 min each side.

ingredients: jaggery 100g, peanuts 50g
directions: 1. Melt jaggery, mix peanuts & spread thin. 2. Cool & cut into pieces.

ingredients: sesame seeds 50g, jaggery 100g
directions: 1. Roast sesame seeds, mix with melted jaggery. 2. Spread thin & cool. Cut into pieces.

ingredients: whole wheat flour 150g, sattu 100g, spices 1 tsp, potato 150g, tomato 1, mustard oil 1 tbsp, salt 1 tsp
directions: 1. Knead dough & shape littis with sattu filling. 2. Bake/grill 20 min. 3. Boil potatoes & tomatoes for chokha.

ingredients: fish 250g, onion 1, tomato 1, garlic 1 clove, ginger 1 tsp, turmeric 0.5 tsp, chili 1, mustard oil 1 tbsp, salt 1 tsp
directions: 1. Sauté onion, garlic, ginger in oil. 2. Add tomato & spices, cook 5 min. 3. Add fish & simmer 10 min.

ingredients: eggs 4, onion 1, tomato 1, garlic 1 clove, ginger 1 tsp, turmeric 0.5 tsp, chili 1, oil 1 tbsp, salt 1 tsp
directions: 1. Boil eggs & peel. 2. Sauté onion, garlic, ginger in oil. 3. Add tomato & spices, cook 5 min. 4. Add eggs & simmer 5 min.

ingredients: Lauki 1 medium, onion 1, tomato 2, garlic 2 cloves, ginger 1 tsp, cumin 1 tsp, turmeric 0.5 tsp, chili powder 0.5 tsp, oil 1 tbsp, salt 1 tsp
directions: 1. Peel & chop lauki. 2. Sauté onion, garlic, ginger in oil. 3. Add tomato & spices, cook 5 min. 4. Add lauki & simmer 15 min until soft.

ingredients: Baby potatoes 500g, onion 1, tomato 1, garlic 2 cloves, ginger 1 tsp, yogurt 2 tbsp, turmeric 0.5 tsp, garam masala 0.5 tsp, oil 2 tbsp, salt 1 tsp
directions: 1. Boil potatoes & peel. 2. Fry potatoes lightly in oil. 3. Sauté onion, garlic, ginger. 4. Add tomato, spices & yogurt, simmer 10 min. 5. Add potatoes & cook 10 min on low flame.

ingredients: Tinda 4, onion 1, tomato 1, garlic 1 clove, ginger 1 tsp, cumin 1 tsp, turmeric 0.5 tsp, chili powder 0.5 tsp, oil 1 tbsp, salt 1 tsp
directions: 1. Chop tindas. 2. Sauté onion, garlic, ginger in oil. 3. Add tomato & spices, cook 5 min. 4. Add tinda & simmer 15 min.

ingredients: Paneer 250g, onion 1, tomato 2, garlic 2 cloves, ginger 1 tsp, cream 2 tbsp, turmeric 0.5 tsp, garam masala 0.5 tsp, chili 1, oil 1 tbsp, salt 1 tsp
directions: 1. Cube paneer & marinate with spices. 2. Grill or pan-fry paneer. 3. Sauté onion, garlic, ginger. 4. Add tomato & spices, cook 5 min. 5. Add paneer & cream, simmer 5 min.

ingredients: Lamb 500g, onion 2, tomato 2, garlic 3 cloves, ginger 1 tbsp, yogurt 2 tbsp, turmeric 0.5 tsp, garam masala 1 tsp, chili powder 1 tsp, oil 2 tbsp, salt 1 tsp
directions: 1. Sauté onion, garlic, ginger in oil. 2. Add tomato & spices, cook 5 min. 3. Add lamb & yogurt, simmer 40 min until tender.

ingredients: Mutton 500g, onion 2, tomato 1, garlic 3 cloves, ginger 1 tbsp, yogurt 2 tbsp, cashew paste 3 tbsp, turmeric 0.5 tsp, garam masala 1 tsp, oil 2 tbsp, salt 1 tsp
directions: 1. Sauté onion, garlic, ginger in oil. 2. Add tomato & spices. 3. Add mutton, yogurt, cashew paste. 4. Simmer 45 min until tender.

ingredients: Minced meat 500g, onion 1, tomato 1, garlic 2 cloves, ginger 1 tsp, peas 100g, turmeric 0.5 tsp, garam masala 0.5 tsp, chili 1, oil 1 tbsp, salt 1 tsp
directions: 1. Sauté onion, garlic, ginger in oil. 2. Add tomato & spices, cook 5 min. 3. Add minced meat & peas, simmer 20 min.

ingredients: Prawns 500g, coconut milk 1 cup, onion 1, tomato 1, garlic 2 cloves, ginger 1 tsp, turmeric 0.5 tsp, chili powder 1 tsp, oil 2 tbsp, salt 1 tsp
directions: 1. Sauté onion, garlic, ginger in oil. 2. Add tomato & spices, cook 5 min. 3. Add prawns & coconut milk, simmer 10 min.

ingredients: Crab 500g, onion 2, tomato 2, garlic 3 cloves, ginger 1 tbsp, chili 1, turmeric 0.5 tsp, coriander powder 1 tsp, oil 2 tbsp, salt 1 tsp
directions: 1. Sauté onion, garlic, ginger in oil. 2. Add tomato & spices. 3. Add crab, simmer 15 min until cooked.

ingredients: Fish fillets 500g, semolina 4 tbsp, turmeric 0.5 tsp, chili 0.5 tsp, salt 1 tsp, oil 3 tbsp
directions: 1. Marinate fish with turmeric, chili & salt. 2. Coat with semolina. 3. Shallow fry in oil until golden, 5-7 min each side.

ingredients: Fish 500g, coconut milk 1 cup, onion 1, tomato 1, garlic 2 cloves, ginger 1 tsp, green chili 1, turmeric 0.5 tsp, curry leaves 8, oil 2 tbsp, salt 1 tsp
directions: 1. Sauté onion, garlic, ginger in oil. 2. Add tomato, chili & spices. 3. Add fish & coconut milk, simmer 10-12 min.

ingredients: Fish 500g, gram flour 4 tbsp, turmeric 0.5 tsp, chili 0.5 tsp, salt 1 tsp, oil 3 tbsp, water 3 tbsp
directions: 1. Mix gram flour, turmeric, chili & salt with water to make batter. 2. Dip fish pieces in batter & deep fry until golden.

ingredients: Fish 500g, yogurt 2 tbsp, turmeric 0.5 tsp, chili 1 tsp, garam masala 0.5 tsp, lemon juice 1 tbsp, oil 1 tbsp, salt 1 tsp
directions: 1. Marinate fish with yogurt, spices & lemon juice 30 min. 2. Grill or pan-fry until cooked, 8-10 min each side.

ingredients: Prawns 500g, turmeric 0.5 tsp, chili 1 tsp, garlic 2 cloves, oil 2 tbsp, salt 1 tsp
directions: 1. Marinate prawns with turmeric, chili & salt 10 min. 2. Sauté garlic in oil. 3. Fry prawns until pink & cooked, 5-7 min.

ingredients: Fish 500g, gram flour 4 tbsp, carom seeds 0.5 tsp, chili 0.5 tsp, turmeric 0.5 tsp, salt 1 tsp, oil 3 tbsp, water 3 tbsp
directions: 1. Make thick batter with gram flour, spices & water. 2. Coat fish pieces & deep fry until crisp.

ingredients: Calamari 500g, turmeric 0.5 tsp, chili 1 tsp, garlic 2 cloves, oil 2 tbsp, salt 1 tsp
directions: 1. Clean & slice calamari. 2. Marinate with turmeric, chili & salt 10 min. 3. Sauté garlic in oil. 4. Fry calamari 5-7 min until cooked.

ingredients: Milk 1L, lemon juice 2 tbsp, sugar 2 cups, water 4 cups, cardamom 2 pods
directions: 1. Boil milk & curdle with lemon juice. 2. Drain curds, knead smooth. 3. Shape balls. 4. Boil sugar syrup, add balls, cook 15 min.

ingredients: Basmati rice 1/2 cup, milk 1L, sugar 1/2 cup, cardamom 2 pods, saffron 5 strands, almonds 10
directions: 1. Boil milk, add rice. 2. Simmer 25 min. 3. Add sugar, saffron, almonds, cook 5 min.

ingredients: Paneer 250g, sugar 1/4 cup, cardamom 1/2 tsp, pistachios 1 tbsp
directions: 1. Crumble paneer, knead smooth. 2. Mix sugar & cardamom. 3. Shape into small pieces, top with pistachios.

ingredients: Rice flour 1 cup, jaggery 1/2 cup, grated coconut 1/2 cup, cardamom 1/2 tsp, ghee 1 tsp
directions: 1. Make dough with rice flour & water. 2. Fill with jaggery-coconut mix. 3. Shape dumplings. 4. Steam 10-12 min.

ingredients: Milk 1L, sugar 1/2 cup, cardamom 1 tsp, pistachios 10, saffron 5 strands
directions: 1. Boil milk, reduce to half. 2. Add sugar, cardamom, saffron & nuts. 3. Pour in molds, freeze 6 hrs.

ingredients: Milk 1L, sugar 1/2 cup, cardamom 2 pods, saffron 5 strands, almonds 10
directions: 1. Boil milk, reduce to thick consistency, stirring constantly. 2. Add sugar, cardamom, saffron & almonds.

ingredients: Gram flour 1 cup, sugar 1 cup, ghee 2 tbsp, cardamom 1 tsp, milk 1/4 cup
directions: 1. Roast gram flour in ghee. 2. Boil sugar & milk to form syrup. 3. Mix with flour, pull to form flaky texture.

ingredients: Cashews 1 cup, sugar 1/2 cup, water 1/4 cup, ghee 1 tsp, cardamom 1/2 tsp
directions: 1. Grind cashews to fine powder. 2. Boil sugar & water, add cashews, cook to dough. 3. Roll, cut diamond shapes.

ingredients: All-purpose flour 1 cup, sugar 1/2 cup, milk 1/2 cup, cardamom 1/2 tsp, ghee 3 tbsp, water 1/4 cup
directions: 1. Mix flour, sugar, milk, water & cardamom to batter. 2. Fry pancakes in ghee until golden. 3. Serve with syrup.

ingredients: Rice flour 1 cup, chana dal 1/2 cup, ginger 1 tsp, green chili 1, salt to taste, oil 2 tsp
directions: 1. Soak chana dal 2 hrs. 2. Grind with spices to paste. 3. Make rice flour dough, stuff with dal paste. 4. Steam 15 min.

ingredients: Whole wheat flour 1 cup, jaggery 1/2 cup, ghee 2 tbsp, cardamom 1/2 tsp
directions: 1. Mix flour, jaggery & ghee to dough. 2. Shape small discs. 3. Deep-fry in ghee until golden.

ingredients: Whole wheat flour 1 cup, sattu flour 1/2 cup, green chili 1, coriander 1 tbsp, salt to taste, ghee 1 tsp
directions: 1. Mix wheat flour & water to dough. 2. Prepare sattu filling with spices. 3. Stuff dough, roll, cook on tawa with ghee.

ingredients: Potatoes 2, tomatoes 2, onion 1, garlic 2 cloves, cumin 1 tsp, turmeric 1/2 tsp, oil 2 tsp
directions: 1. Saute onion & garlic. 2. Add spices & tomatoes, cook 5 min. 3. Add potatoes & water, simmer 15 min.

ingredients: All-purpose flour 1 cup, ghee 2 tbsp, yogurt 2 tbsp, sugar 1/2 cup, baking soda 1/4 tsp
directions: 1. Mix flour, ghee & yogurt to dough. 2. Shape discs. 3. Fry until golden. 4. Dip in sugar syrup.

ingredients: Pearl spot fish 500g, coconut oil 2 tsp, ginger-garlic paste 1 tsp, green chili 1, turmeric 1/2 tsp, curry leaves 1 sprig, salt to taste
directions: 1. Marinate fish with spices 30 min. 2. Wrap in banana leaf, cook on pan with coconut oil 10 min per side.

ingredients: Fish 500g, coconut milk 1 cup, turmeric 1/2 tsp, green chili 1, ginger-garlic paste 1 tsp, curry leaves 1 sprig
directions: 1. Heat spices in coconut milk. 2. Add fish, simmer 10 min.

ingredients: Prawns 500g, coconut milk 1 cup, red chili powder 1 tsp, turmeric 1/2 tsp, curry leaves, oil 1 tsp
directions: 1. Saute spices in oil. 2. Add prawns & coconut milk, simmer 10 min.

ingredients: Fish 500g, coconut milk 1 cup, turmeric 1/2 tsp, ginger 1 tsp, curry leaves, rice flour 1 cup (for appam), water
directions: 1. Cook fish in coconut milk with spices 10 min. 2. Prepare appam batter, ferment 6 hrs, cook pancakes on tawa.

ingredients: Fish 500g, tamarind pulp 2 tbsp, chili powder 1 tsp, turmeric 1/2 tsp, curry leaves 1 sprig, oil 1 tsp
directions: 1. Heat oil, add spices & tamarind. 2. Add fish, simmer 10 min.

ingredients: Mackerel 500g, onion 1, tomato 1, chili powder 1 tsp, turmeric 1/2 tsp, oil 1 tsp
directions: 1. Saute onion & tomato. 2. Add spices & fish, cook 10-12 min.

ingredients: Fish 500g, coconut milk 1 cup, tamarind 1 tbsp, red chili 1 tsp, turmeric 1/2 tsp, oil 1 tsp
directions: 1. Boil coconut milk with spices & tamarind. 2. Add fish, simmer 10 min.

ingredients: Prawns 500g, coconut 1/2 cup, coriander 2 tbsp, chili 1 tsp, turmeric 1/2 tsp, oil 1 tsp
directions: 1. Grind coconut & coriander to paste. 2. Saute with spices & prawns 10 min.

ingredients: Clams 500g, coconut milk 1 cup, green chili 1, turmeric 1/2 tsp, garlic 1 tsp, oil 1 tsp
directions: 1. Saute spices & garlic in oil. 2. Add clams & coconut milk, simmer 10 min.

ingredients: Hakka noodles 200g, cabbage 1 cup, carrot 1 cup, capsicum 1, soy sauce 2 tbsp, sesame oil 1 tsp, garlic 1 tsp
directions: 1. Boil noodles. 2. Stir-fry vegetables in sesame oil & garlic. 3. Add noodles & soy sauce, toss 2-3 min.

ingredients: Chicken 500g, cornflour 2 tbsp, soy sauce 1 tbsp, chili sauce 2 tbsp, garlic 1 tsp, oil 2 tsp
directions: 1. Coat chicken with cornflour, shallow fry. 2. Prepare sauce with soy & chili, add chicken, toss 3-5 min.

ingredients: Paneer 250g, bell peppers 1 cup, onion 1, garlic 1 tsp, soy sauce 1 tbsp, chili sauce 1 tbsp, oil 1 tsp
directions: 1. Cube paneer, shallow fry. 2. Stir-fry vegetables & sauces 3-4 min. 3. Toss paneer, serve hot.

ingredients: Cooked rice 2 cups, carrot 1/2 cup, peas 1/2 cup, capsicum 1/2 cup, soy sauce 1 tbsp, oil 1 tsp
directions: 1. Heat oil, stir-fry vegetables. 2. Add rice & soy sauce, toss 3-4 min.

ingredients: Mushrooms 1 cup, tofu 100g, vinegar 1 tbsp, soy sauce 1 tbsp, chili sauce 1 tsp, water 3 cups, cornflour 1 tsp
directions: 1. Boil water with vegetables & tofu. 2. Mix soy, vinegar & chili. 3. Thicken with cornflour slurry.

ingredients: Chicken 500g, garlic 2 tsp, soy sauce 1 tbsp, black pepper 1/2 tsp, oil 2 tsp
directions: 1. Marinate chicken with garlic & soy 15 min. 2. Stir-fry 8-10 min.

ingredients: Hakka noodles 200g, bell peppers 1/2 cup, cabbage 1/2 cup, Schezwan sauce 2 tbsp, oil 1 tsp
directions: 1. Boil noodles. 2. Stir-fry vegetables in oil. 3. Add noodles & Schezwan sauce, toss 2-3 min.

ingredients: Potatoes 250g, honey 1 tbsp, soy sauce 1 tsp, chili sauce 1 tsp, cornstarch 1 tbsp, oil 2 tsp
directions: 1. Fry potato sticks. 2. Toss in sauce of honey, soy, chili for 2-3 min.

ingredients: Chicken wings 500g, garlic 1 tsp, ginger 1 tsp, cornflour 2 tbsp, chili sauce 2 tbsp, oil 2 tsp
directions: 1. Marinate wings in spices & cornflour 30 min. 2. Fry 8-10 min. 3. Toss in chili sauce.

ingredients: chickpeas 200g, onion 1, tomato 2, ginger 1 tsp, garlic 1 tsp, chole masala 2 tsp, bhatura dough 300g (maida, yogurt, oil)
directions: 1. Soak chickpeas overnight & boil. 2. Cook onion, tomato, spices. 3. Deep fry bhature.

ingredients: potatoes 300g, chaat masala 1 tsp, green chutney 2 tbsp, tamarind chutney 2 tbsp, yogurt 50g
directions: 1. Boil & mash potatoes, form tikkis, shallow fry. 2. Serve with chutneys, yogurt, chaat masala.

ingredients: papdi 100g, potato 100g, yogurt 50g, tamarind chutney 2 tbsp, green chutney 2 tbsp
directions: 1. Arrange papdi on plate. 2. Add potatoes, chutneys, yogurt, sprinkle masala.

ingredients: paneer 250g, bell pepper 1, onion 1, yogurt 50g, tikka masala 2 tsp
directions: 1. Marinate paneer & veggies in yogurt + spices. 2. Grill until charred.

ingredients: paratha 4, paneer/chicken 200g, onion 1, capsicum 1, chutney 2 tbsp
directions: 1. Cook filling with spices. 2. Wrap in paratha with onions & chutney.

ingredients: kulcha bread 4, chickpeas 200g, onion 1, tomato 2, chole masala 2 tsp
directions: 1. Prepare chole curry. 2. Serve hot with kulcha.

ingredients: urad dal 150g, yogurt 200g, tamarind chutney 2 tbsp, green chutney 2 tbsp
directions: 1. Soak dal, grind & fry into balls. 2. Soak in water, squeeze, serve with yogurt & chutneys.

ingredients: bread 4 slices, besan 100g, potato 100g, spices 1 tsp, oil for frying
directions: 1. Make potato filling. 2. Coat bread in besan batter, deep fry.

ingredients: moong dal 150g, spices 1 tsp, radish grated 50g, chutneys 2 tbsp
directions: 1. Grind soaked dal, fry into fritters. 2. Serve with radish & chutneys.

ingredients: white peas 200g, kulcha bread 4, onion 1, tomato 1, spices 1 tsp
directions: 1. Boil peas, mash slightly, season. 2. Serve with kulcha.

ingredients: momo dough 200g, chicken/veg filling 200g, tandoori masala 1 tsp, yogurt 50g
directions: 1. Prepare momos, marinate with yogurt & spices. 2. Grill until charred.

ingredients: pav buns 4, potato 300g, garlic 1 tsp, green chili 1, gram flour 100g, chutneys 4 tbsp
directions: 1. Boil potatoes, mash with spices. 2. Shape into balls, dip in besan batter, deep fry. 3. Serve in pav with chutneys.

ingredients: sabudana 200g, potato 150g, peanuts 50g, green chili 1, cumin seeds 1 tsp
directions: 1. Soak sabudana overnight. 2. Fry peanuts, add potato, cumin, chili. 3. Add sabudana, cook until translucent.

ingredients: bread 6 slices, cucumber 50g, tomato 50g, beetroot 50g, green chutney 2 tbsp, butter 20g
directions: 1. Spread chutney & butter on bread. 2. Layer sliced veggies. 3. Cut & serve.

ingredients: puris 24, potato 150g, onion 50g, tomato 50g, green chutney 2 tbsp, tamarind chutney 2 tbsp, sev 50g
directions: 1. Arrange puris, fill with potato & onions. 2. Top with chutneys & sev.

ingredients: white peas 200g, potato 200g, onion 50g, tomato 50g, spices 1 tsp, chutneys 2 tbsp
directions: 1. Prepare ragda curry. 2. Shallow fry potato patties. 3. Assemble with chutneys.

ingredients: urad dal 200g, green chili 1, ginger 1 tsp, curry leaves 5, oil for frying
directions: 1. Soak dal, grind, season. 2. Shape doughnuts, deep fry.

ingredients: dosa batter 300g, potato 200g, onion 50g, curry leaves 5, oil 20ml
directions: 1. Make potato masala. 2. Spread batter on tawa, stuff with masala.

ingredients: dosa batter 300g, onion 50g, tomato 50g, green chili 1, oil 20ml
directions: 1. Pour batter thickly, top with veggies, cook both sides.

ingredients: dosa batter 200g, green chili 1, onion 50g, oil for frying
directions: 1. Mix batter with chili & onion. 2. Drop spoonfuls into hot oil.

ingredients: urad dal 150g, rice flour 50g, green chili 1, yogurt 50g, oil for frying
directions: 1. Mix dal paste with rice flour, chili, yogurt. 2. Shape balls, deep fry.

ingredients: noodles 200g, cabbage 100g, carrot 50g, capsicum 50g, soy sauce 1 tbsp, oil 20ml

ingredients: paratha 4, chicken 200g, onion 50g, green chili 1, chutney 2 tbsp
directions: 1. Cook chicken with spices. 2. Wrap in paratha with onions & chutney.

ingredients: potato 200g, beetroot 100g, bread crumbs 50g, oil for frying
directions: 1. Boil & mash veggies. 2. Shape, coat with crumbs, deep fry.

ingredients: paratha 4, egg 4, onion 50g, chutney 2 tbsp
directions: 1. Fry paratha with egg. 2. Add onions & chutney, roll up.

ingredients: burger bun 4, potato 300g, bread crumbs 50g, lettuce 50g, tomato 50g
directions: 1. Shape potato tikki, shallow fry. 2. Assemble burger with veggies.

ingredients: roti 4, potato 200g, onion 50g, chutney 2 tbsp
directions: 1. Stuff roti with potato masala & onions. 2. Roll & serve.

ingredients: corn kernels 200g, onion 50g, tomato 50g, lemon juice 1 tbsp, chaat masala 1 tsp
directions: 1. Boil corn, mix with veggies & spices.

ingredients: Maggi noodles 140g, water 400ml, spice mix 1 packet, veggies 50g
directions: 1. Boil noodles with veggies & spice mix.

ingredients: roasted peanuts 100g, onion 50g, tomato 50g, green chili 1, lemon juice 1 tbsp
directions: 1. Mix all ingredients, serve fresh.

ingredients: potato 200g, carrot 50g, beans 50g, bread crumbs 50g, oil for frying
directions: 1. Boil & mash veggies. 2. Shape, coat, deep fry.

ingredients: potato 300g, onion 50g, green chili 1, lemon juice 1 tbsp, chaat masala 1 tsp
directions: 1. Fry potatoes until crispy. 2. Toss with onions, chili, lemon juice, spices.

ingredients: black tea leaves 5g, milk 150ml, water 150ml, sugar 10g, ginger 5g, cardamom 2 pods, cloves 2
directions: 1. Boil water with spices. 2. Add tea leaves & milk, simmer. 3. Strain & serve.

ingredients: black tea leaves 5g, milk 150ml, water 150ml, sugar 10g, ginger 10g
directions: 1. Boil ginger in water. 2. Add tea leaves & milk, simmer. 3. Strain & serve.

ingredients: black tea leaves 5g, milk 150ml, water 150ml, sugar 10g, cardamom 3 pods
directions: 1. Boil water with cardamom. 2. Add tea leaves & milk, simmer. 3. Strain & serve.

ingredients: black tea leaves 5g, milk 150ml, water 150ml, sugar 10g, spices (ginger/cardamom) optional
directions: 1. Brew tea with milk & spices. 2. Serve hot in clay cups.

ingredients: black tea leaves 5g, milk 150ml, water 150ml, sugar 10g, spices optional

ingredients: filter coffee powder 10g, water 100ml, milk 150ml, sugar 10g

ingredients: black tea leaves 5g, condensed milk 50ml, water 200ml, sugar 10g

ingredients: black tea leaves 5g, water 200ml, lemon juice 10ml, honey 5g

ingredients: green tea leaves 3g, water 200ml, lemon juice 5ml, sugar 5g

ingredients: chilled milk 200ml, instant coffee powder 5g, sugar 15g, ice cubes 100g
directions: 1. Blend milk, coffee, sugar, and ice until frothy. 2. Serve chilled in tall glass.

ingredients: pizza base 150g, mozzarella cheese 200g, tomato sauce 50g, oregano 1 tsp, chili flakes 1 tsp
directions: 1. Spread sauce on base. 2. Add half cheese, place second thin layer of base, fill with more cheese. 3. Top with remaining cheese and seasonings. 4. Bake at 220°C for 12–15 min.

directions: 1. Marinate paneer with yogurt and tikka masala 30 min. 2. Spread sauce on base, add cheese, arrange paneer, bake 12 min at 220°C.

directions: 1. Spread sauce on base, top with cheese, add all veggies, bake 12–15 min at 220°C.

ingredients: bread slices 4 (100g), cheese 80g, tomato sauce 40g, mixed vegetables 50g

ingredients: naan 150g, cheese 120g, tomato sauce 50g, mixed veggies 50g

ingredients: pizza base 150g, cheese 100g, tomato sauce 50g, capsicum 30g, corn 30g

ingredients: burger buns 2 (120g), potato 150g, breadcrumbs 30g, spices 5g, chutney 20g

directions: 1. Pan-fry paneer slice with spices. 2. Place in bun with lettuce and chutney.

ingredients: small pizza base 80g, cheese 50g, sauce 20g, veggies 30g

ingredients: burger buns 2 (120g), egg 1 (50g), lettuce 20g, mayo 15g
directions: 1. Fry egg sunny side up or omelette style. 2. Place in bun with lettuce and mayo.

ingredients: bread 6 slices (150g), cucumber 40g, tomato 40g, beetroot 40g, mint chutney 20g, butter 20g
directions: 1. Spread butter and chutney on bread, layer veggies, cut and serve.

ingredients: sub roll 150g, lettuce 40g, tomato 40g, cucumber 40g, cheese 40g, mayo 20g
directions: 1. Slice roll, add veggies, cheese, and mayo.

ingredients: sub roll 150g, chicken tikka 100g, lettuce 40g, tomato 40g, mayo 20g

ingredients: sub roll 150g, paneer 100g, lettuce 40g, tomato 40g, mayo 20g
directions: 1. Slice roll, add grilled paneer, veggies, and mayo.

ingredients: bread slices 4 (100g), cheese 80g, butter 20g
directions: 1. Butter bread, add cheese, grill until golden.

ingredients: bread slices 4 (100g), paneer 80g, chutney 20g, butter 10g
directions: 1. Mash paneer with chutney, spread on bread, toast if desired.
